description: Flights to and from the Spanish islands have been disrupted, leaving tourists stranded at airports.
title: Canary Islands sandstorm: Flights disrupted as dust cloud strands tourists
title_page: Canary Islands sandstorm: Flights disrupted as dust cloud strands tourists - BBC News
maintext: "I'm really worried about things like there's people who've got medication in their cases - none of us has had our cases since Friday," she said. "There's people who are running out of insulin. It's really difficult there at the moment."
